attributes.action: Invest in a British Institute of Sport to ensure Britain exceeds in the 2012 Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain has been given a once in a lifetime oportunity to host the greatest sporting event in the world, the Olympics in 2012. This presents massive oportunities to produce great prestige for the nation through hosting the games, but also help propel Britain to the forefront of competitive sports, which could be achieved by funding a British Institute of Sport based on the succesfull system set up in Australia.
